Description: Wilberforce University used funds from the United Negro College Fund, Jack and Jill and other sources to clear more than 375,000 in debt
Title: Wilberforce University in Ohio surprises 2020 and spring 2021 graduates by erasing 375K in debt owed to university
Author: USA TODAY, N'dea Yancey Bragg, USA TODAY

Description: Apple has today announced that it is awarding innovation grants worth five million dollars to four historically black colleges and universities (HBCU), according to USA Today Alabama A M University, Howard University, Morgan State University, and Prai
Title: Apple Awarding 5 Million 'Innovation Grants' to Four Historically Black Colleges and Universities
Author: Hartley Charlton

Description: He went from backpacking to entrepreneur after leaving university to travel the world looking for his true self, but what he found was the path to success in sustainable business
Title: At age 21, he went backpacking to find himself and ended up founding one of the largest sustainable startups in Latin America
Author: Mairem Del R o

Description: Saundra Pelletier is marketing a new form of birth control to women wary of hormones
Title: What is the Phexxi Birth Control Method, and Who Owns It
Author: Valeriya Safronova

Description: The latest version of a multiyear analysis of Fortune 100 and 500 companies found that white women made some gains but that true representation is decades away
Title: Surprise Women and Minorities Are Still Underrepresented in Corporate Boardrooms
Author: Alisha Haridasani Gupta and Lalena Fisher
